subdivision_of_building:
Proposals principally relate to land adjacent to existing buildings. 

Works to existing buildings includes demolition of existing kitchen block to the east of Bedfont House but retaining the covered passage that links it to the house. The exposed eastern end of the link range would be finished with a wall and door. The pitched roof of the link range will be extended eastwards to connect to the proposed new building. A canopy will be provided to the north of the link to provide covered access to the stair up to the first floor of the new building and to the ground-floor walkway along its northern side but is not connected directly to the link range.

application_details.lead_registered_social_landlord: David Henry Home - Registered Provider Ref: L2023

description: Erection of a phased development part two, part three storey Class C3 block to form 31 residential units and associated works including landscaping, private and communal amenity space, alteration to pedestrian access and provision of car and cycle parking refuse storage and plant. Alterations to link connecting to existing building and demolition of ancillary block
